item.title: Blockchain: An Easy to Digest Detailed Explanation
item.description: Who didn’t hear about Bitcoin and the fascinating surge that occured to its value ? And who didn’t encounter a post or an article talking about the magic of cryptocurrencies that could make you rich suddenly ? I imagine that everybody could relate to these questions. Unfortunately, this trend and hype is usually used by medias and blogs in order to gain views and reach, but rarely to discuss the technologies behind it.
